page.title: 08YACHT MARINAS, ST.HELIER
page.content: Within St.Helier harbour yachts can be moored at the Old Harbour,the English Harbour, La Collette and the St. Helier Marina. The marina at La Collette was opened in 1977 and can hold 300 craft. Some of these are permanent berths costing Â£1000 p/a, while visitors pay Â£5 a day for a 9 metre craft and Â£10 for 15 metres. The St.Helier Marina was opened in 1981 and provides 180 permanent berths and 200 for visitors. It has both fresh water and electricity on supply, a shop, showers and is very near to the centre of the town. In 1984 over 11,000 visitors used these marinas, mostly from France, but also from Britain, Belgium, Scandanavia and even from as far afield as Canada.
